mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE(NOTICE_SEQ, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_ID, NOTICE_REGDATE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_DELFLAG) VALUES(NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{notice_title}, #{notice_id}, SYSDATE, #{notice_content}, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT RNUM, NOTICE_SEQ, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_ID, NOTICE_REGDATE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_DELFLAG FROM(SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NOTICE_SEQ) RNUM, NOTICE_SEQ, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_ID, NOTICE_REGDATE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_DELFLAG FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_DELFLAG = 'N') WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_DELFLAG='N'
